\paragraph{cometr.global\_metrics.MSE module}
\label{\detokenize{cometr.global_metrics:module-cometr.global_metrics.MSE}}\label{\detokenize{cometr.global_metrics:cometr-global-metrics-mse-module}}\index{module@\spxentry{module}!cometr.global\_metrics.MSE@\spxentry{cometr.global\_metrics.MSE}}\index{cometr.global\_metrics.MSE@\spxentry{cometr.global\_metrics.MSE}!module@\spxentry{module}}\index{MSE (class in cometr.global\_metrics.MSE)@\spxentry{MSE}\spxextra{class in cometr.global\_metrics.MSE}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{cometr.global_metrics:cometr.global_metrics.MSE.MSE}}
\pysigstartsignatures
\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{class\DUrole{w,w}{  }}}\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{cometr.global\_metrics.MSE.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{MSE}}}{\sphinxparam{\DUrole{n,n}{file1}\DUrole{p,p}{:}\DUrole{w,w}{  }\DUrole{n,n}{str}}, \sphinxparam{\DUrole{n,n}{file2}\DUrole{p,p}{:}\DUrole{w,w}{  }\DUrole{n,n}{str}}, \sphinxparam{\DUrole{n,n}{file1\_key}\DUrole{p,p}{:}\DUrole{w,w}{  }\DUrole{n,n}{str}\DUrole{w,w}{  }\DUrole{o,o}{=}\DUrole{w,w}{  }\DUrole{default_value}{\textquotesingle{}/entry/data/data\textquotesingle{}}}, \sphinxparam{\DUrole{n,n}{file2\_key}\DUrole{p,p}{:}\DUrole{w,w}{  }\DUrole{n,n}{str}\DUrole{w,w}{  }\DUrole{o,o}{=}\DUrole{w,w}{  }\DUrole{default_value}{\textquotesingle{}/entry/data/data\textquotesingle{}}}, \sphinxparam{\DUrole{n,n}{output\_text}\DUrole{p,p}{:}\DUrole{w,w}{  }\DUrole{n,n}{str}\DUrole{w,w}{  }\DUrole{o,o}{=}\DUrole{w,w}{  }\DUrole{default_value}{\textquotesingle{}output.txt\textquotesingle{}}}}{}
\pysigstopsignatures
\sphinxAtStartPar
Bases: \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{object}}

\sphinxAtStartPar
Calculates the Mean Squared Error (MSE) between two HDF5 files containing voxel data.
\begin{description}
\sphinxlineitem{Args:}
\sphinxAtStartPar
file1 (str): Path to the first HDF5 file. Required command\sphinxhyphen{}line argument: \sphinxhyphen{}f1/\textendash{}file1.
file2 (str): Path to the second HDF5 file. Required command\sphinxhyphen{}line argument: \sphinxhyphen{}f2/\textendash{}file2.
file1\_key (str, optional): Key to the voxel data in the first file. Defaults to ‘/entry/data/data’.
file2\_key (str, optional): Key to the voxel data in the second file. Defaults to ‘/entry/data/data’.
output\_text (str, optional): Path to the output text file for saving the result. Defaults to ‘output.txt’.

\sphinxlineitem{Returns:}
\sphinxAtStartPar
str: The path to the output text file if \sphinxtitleref{output\_text} is provided, otherwise an empty string.

\sphinxlineitem{Raises:}
\sphinxAtStartPar
FileNotFoundError: If either \sphinxtitleref{file1} or \sphinxtitleref{file2} is not found.
h5py.FileError: If there is an error reading the HDF5 file.
ValueError: If the voxel data in both files do not have matching dimensions.
Exception: If an unexpected error occurs.

\sphinxlineitem{Example:}\begin{description}
\sphinxlineitem{Usage::}
\sphinxAtStartPar
from MSE import MSE
mse\_instance = MSE(‘file1.h5’, ‘file2.h5’, output\_text=’output.txt’)
result = mse\_instance.calc\_mse()

\end{description}

\end{description}
\index{calc\_mse() (cometr.global\_metrics.MSE.MSE method)@\spxentry{calc\_mse()}\spxextra{cometr.global\_metrics.MSE.MSE method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{cometr.global_metrics:cometr.global_metrics.MSE.MSE.calc_mse}}
\pysigstartsignatures
\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{calc\_mse}}}{}{{ $\rightarrow$ float32}}
\pysigstopsignatures
\sphinxAtStartPar
Calculates the mean squared error of the two numpy arrays and saves the result to the specified text file.
\begin{description}
\sphinxlineitem{Returns:}
\sphinxAtStartPar
float: The mean squared error of the two numpy arrays.

\end{description}

\end{fulllineitems}
